items.name: Stretch
items.line: He was one of The Boss's boys, like us, but he got cold feet and wanted out.

items.name: Skids
items.line: But The Boss didn't like that.

items.name: Stretch
items.line: Yeah, Jimmy thought he was smart and got some dirt on The Boss.

items.name: Stretch
items.line: The kinda dirt you don't want getting out. Ain't so smart now are ya Rat.

items.name: The Fixer
items.line: Ah, so you swiped the dirt, and wiped The Rat?

items.name: Stretch
items.line: But now we got this stinkin' body to deal with.

items.name: Stretch
items.line: We usually do the killing... not the cleaning... that's why you're here, right?

items.name: Stretch
items.line: Great! We'll do whatever ya need. Just get us outta this mess.
